website_summaries.verdict: A solid, stylish, smooth-steering, and decently priced bike headset that works even better than it looks.
cons: While we appreciate the range of vibrant metallic hues, the price between colors may differ wildly

customer_reviews.title: Sealed cartridge bearings, decent looking quality.  Light.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on an older 2004 Specialized Rockhopper. I really prefer sealed bearing headsets so finally bought one for this older bike. I have a Cane Creek S2 headset on another bike and it's a bit better quality, but this FSA one has sealed cartridge bearings, and installed fine. The crown race that goes on the fork looks to be aluminum. I haven't installed that yet as I bought a new fork that arrives tomorrow. Once I get it fully together and some rides in I'll update this review. Update as of 8/15/18. I've got a few rides now with this installed. It's super smooth and zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Crown race is screwed up.
customer_reviews.text: Headset seems great but the crown race seems to be the wrong size. It doesn't fit in the bottom cup properly and also for some reason it will not mount parallel properly to the fork. I'm pretty disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Bell

customer_reviews.title: Bling and performance for cheaper than Chris King
customer_reviews.text: I love bike bling, but I don't see any the need to pay a lot of money for Chris King on every single project I do. The FSA Orbit MX is my go to performance headset because it is well built and comes in a wide variety of colors. I use the money I save on this to buy other awesome parts.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Editor

customer_reviews.title: Install using proper tools/torque and enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, anodizing is durable, bearings are very smooth. Zero issues quality has been Excellent. Massive upgrade from the slimline/crane creek/aheadset randomness that came on my bike
customer_reviews.author: Chase W.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operator
customer_reviews.text: Working great. Install was pretty straight forward. Cartridge bearings are super smooth. The top cup has a nice cover ring that acts as a seal, much nicer and more durable than the cracked plastic o-ring that was on the headset I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great head unit. Easy to install. I would recommend it to anyone needing a new head set.
customer_reviews.author: ZT

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the Cane Creek 40 it replaced
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the Cane Creek 40 it replaced. However it looks even better! The red just screams pimpin! Went with the carbon spacers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable headset
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to say about it, other than it works great, looks great, and a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Scott V.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my Schwinn Pro Stock SE. It was a great fit. Good all around part for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cmb

customer_reviews.title: Pink not read
customer_reviews.text: This is significantly more pink than the pictures. As pictured here would match the red on my bike. BUT it's pink.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from stock caged bearing system. I love it. And it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best upgrades i have made to my bike
customer_reviews.text: One of the best upgrades i have made to my bike. I replaced my original headset baised off of a comment made to me by my buddy who races. This has a far superior bearings to the originals... turns smooth as butter
customer_reviews.author: Derik Cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new headset badly. I ordered and it arrived quickly. Easy to install, looks great, love the sealed bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy  Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Having broken his previous one, my son put this on his wish list for Christmas, he told me just yesterday that he is very pleased with this new headset
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Smooth as butter. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality headset for the money. Time will tell I guess, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: bradtwr

customer_reviews.title: beter than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality head set and I expect it to take the abuse of rugged mountain bike riding.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: It's a great headset, but it came from the seller without ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headset, but it came from the seller without a compression ring. I had to purchase it separately and wait several days.
customer_reviews.author: mullane

customer_reviews.title: FSA Orbit Mix Black Really Nice looking Easy to Install Five ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: FSA Orbit Mix Black Really Nice looking Easy to Install Five ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Culichi@2Z

customer_reviews.title: FSA Orbit MX Headset
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and functions really well. The headset is very smooth, durable, and reasonably priced. I have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: FSA Orbit Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight headset. Good price. Will likely last the life span of the bike. Using it in a Formula BMX bike.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Greenass

customer_reviews.title: Product so far is great, give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product so far is great, give it 5 stars. Product description would be nice if it said it includes the star nut so I didn't order one separately. Thankfully it's not a lot of money or I'd really be pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I received 3 iPhone chargers instead of the headset. Like, how does that even happen.
customer_reviews.author: AbdominalSnowman

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The angle set bearings are much smoother than previous ball bearing headsets. Not only that they are much easier to install. If you are in a pinch and have a dumbbell weight with removable weight plates this can be used to install a headset. Just go slowly, ensure you maintain proper alignment and support your front wheel/fork assy. Tighten slowly until you see no spaces and stop prior to the headset binding from over tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the worn out headset on my Big Flyer with this. Looks great, smooth function and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FSA Orbit MX Headset
product_meta.description:
FSA Orbit MX threadless headset features TH brand 36 degree angular contact sealed bearings.

• Forged and CNC machined 6061/T6 aluminum cups 
• Patented alignment tip for increased durability and performance 
• TH Brand 36 degree Angular Contact sealed bearings 
• 7075 alloy crown race 
• Laser etched aluminum top cap
• 1-1/8" Threadless
• Stack Height: 18.7 + 13.4 = 32.1mm
• Weight: 103 grams

Brand: FSA
feature_bullets: Suitable for MTN, ROAD or MX
**Anodized colors will vary from batch to batch and may not match exactly
